purpleculture_pinyin:
tū
to stick out; protruding; convex; male (connector etc); Taiwan pr. [tu2]
торчать; выступающие; выпуклый; папа (разъем и т. д.); Тайвань пр. [tu2]
rtega_mnemonic:
凸凸RS
X		convex, protruding
  • → 凸

凸凸RSprotrude, bulge out, convex
  • upper part protrudes from the bottom
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 凹
Ideographic: A rectangle with a bulge
purpleculture_examples:
凸显 [ tū xiǎn ]: to present clearly; to give prominence to; to magnify; clear and obvious
凸现 [ tū xiàn ]: to come to prominence; to appear clearly; to stick out
凸出 [ tū chū ]: to protrude; to stick out
凸起 [ tū qǐ ]: convex; protruding; to protrude; to bulge; to buckle upwards
凹凸 [ āo tū ]: concave or convex; bumps and holes; uneven (surface); rugged
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
heisig_chinese_memo: Clear image of a convex object
heisig_story: Maybe this helps you see how the Japanese have no trouble keeping convex distinct from concave. Note the odd feeling of the third stroke. If it doesn't feel all that strange now, by the time you are done with this book, it will. There are very few times you will have to write it.
koohiiStory1: When I get vexed, I give people the middle finger.
jp_example_words: 凸凹(でこぼこ): unevenness, roughness, ruggedness
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The convex radical and the convex kanji are the same, so hopefully you now just know them both.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Study your radicals and you'll read good.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Is this convex? It's totes (とつ) convex!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Tote bags are totes not convex though. Don't mix them up.
Ru_Words:
凸でこ
  • выпуклый лоб, башка
    • 凸凹でこぼこ
  • неровный, ухабистый, в выбоинах, мятый, изрезанный
    • 凹凸おうとつ
  • вогнутость и выпуклость; неровность
    • 凸面とつめん
  • выпуклая поверхность
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 凵 (открытая коробка)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Clear image of a convex object
humanum_full_description_en:
" Convex " is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols, which only appeared after Qin and Han. (Qiu Xigui) There is no such word in "Shuowen". The original meaning is higher than the surroundings, opposite to " concave ". "Jade articles. "Abu": "Convex, Qi Yan." "Guang Yun. "No rhyme": "Protruding, protruding." For example, Huang Tao of the Tang Dynasty "Lingshan Sculpture of Bishamen Heavenly King Stele in the North": "The building that protrudes from the corridor is the enemy building, and the number of floors in the building is 20 out of three." "Song History" . "He Qu Zhi No. 1": "The minister asks the Cao Gongsuo in the eastern boundary of the self-defense prefecture to drive five miles to the east of the canal. The protruding part of the northern bank of Hebei, the solid soil on the bank will attract it.

" Convex " is often used with " concave ", see " concave ".
humanum_short_description_en: " Convex " is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols. The original meaning is higher than the surroundings, opposite to " concave ".
humanum_full_description:
「凸」是抽象形符造成的表意字，秦漢以後才出現。（裘錫圭）《說文》無此字。本義是高於周圍，與「凹」相對。《玉篇．亞部》：「凸，起皃。」《廣韻．沒韻》：「凸，凸出皃。」如唐代黃滔〈靈山塑北方毗沙門天王碑〉：「自廊凸而出之為敵樓，樓之層者二十有三。」《宋史．河渠志一》：「臣請自衞州東界曹公所開運渠東五里，河北岸凸處，就岸實土堅引之。」

　　「凸」常與「凹」連用，參見「凹」。
humanum_short_description: 「凸」是抽象形符造成的表意字。本義是高於周圍，與「凹」相對。

    「 凸 」是抽象形符造成的表意字，秦漢以後才出現。（裘錫圭）《說文》無此字。本義是高於周圍，與「 凹 」相對。《玉篇．亞部》：「凸，起皃。」《廣韻．沒韻》：「凸，凸出皃。」如唐代黃滔〈靈山塑北方毗沙門天王碑〉：「自廊凸而出之為敵樓，樓之層者二十有三。」《宋史．河渠志一》：「臣請自衞州東界曹公所開運渠東五里，河北岸凸處，就岸實土堅引之。」 「 凸 」常與「 凹 」連用，參見「 凹 」。
    " Convex" is an ideographic character created by abstract symbols, which only appeared after Qin and Han. (Qiu Xigui) There is no such word in "Shuowen". The original meaning is higher than the surroundings, opposite to " concave". "Jade articles. "Abu": "Convex, Qi Yan." "Guang Yun. "No rhyme": "Protruding, protruding." For example, Huang Tao of the Tang Dynasty "Lingshan Sculpture of Bishamen Heavenly King Stele in the North": "The building that protrudes from the corridor is the enemy building, and the number of floors in the building is 20 out of three." "Song History" . "He Qu Zhi No. 1": "The minister asks the Cao Gongsuo in the eastern boundary of the self-defense prefecture to drive five miles to the east of the canal. The protruding part of the northern bank of Hebei, the solid soil on the bank will attract it. " Convex" is often used with " concave", see " concave".

    凸字的基本解释

    凸
    tū
    高出周围，与“凹”相对：凸出。凸起。凸透镜。凸凹不平。
    凹

    凸字的汉语字典释义

    [①]［tū］
    ［《廣韻》陀骨切，入没，定。］
    ［《廣韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
    高出；突起。与“凹”相对。

    凸字的英文翻译

    ◎ 凸
    protruding

    凸字的康熙字典解释

    【子集下】【凵字部】　凸； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页135第09
    【唐韻】陀骨切【集韻】陁沒切，?豚入聲。出貌。【杜甫詩】雲靁心凸知難捧。【杜牧詩】酒凸觥心瀲灩光。又【通俗文】肉凸曰瘤。又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徒結切，音迭。高也。

    凸字的源字形

    凸字的起名意思

    高于周围的，如球形或圆形的外部或其一部分那样弯曲的――指从外面观看一个球面或曲线。跟"凹"相对。

    Convex

    Higher than the surroundings, as opposed to "concave": protruding. Raised. Convex lens. Uneven.

Also [Popular Culture] The convexity of flesh is called tumor. Also 【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? The only knot is cut, the sound is repeated. High also.
    Convex
    Source glyph
    Convex
    Name meaning
    Higher than the surrounding, curved like the outside or part of a sphere or circle-refers to a sphere or curve viewed from the outside. Contrast with "concave".
    凸
    象形字。像物体中间凸起形。凸指周围低、中间高。
    高于周围,与“凹”相对:~出|~起|挺胸~肚。
    ~岸 ~版 ~出 ~窗 ~焊 ~镜 ~轮~面
    ~起 ~显 ~缘 ~透镜 凹~
